text: Following this prioritization exercise, a subgroup of GDG members met to review the results from the survey and to agree on the algorithms to be prioritized.They reached a consensus to address seven priority algorithms in the first phase of the guideline update (see Annex 4 in that publication) (11), and to address four algorithms relevant to HPV mRNA testing as part of the second phase of the guideline update (see Annex 4 in that publication) (12).

response: 在指南更新过程中，优先处理的算法可以通过调查结果和专家组的共识来确定。其中，GDG成员小组评审了调查结果，并达成共识，决定在指南更新的第一阶段优先处理七个主要算法。在随后第二阶段的更新中，将重点处理与HPV mRNA检测相关的四个算法。这种分阶段更新的方法有助于确保重点问题的依次解决，并推动 HPV mRNA检测等关键技术的规范化应用，共同提升筛查和诊断的科学性与效率。
